mapper.insert: INSERT INTO finished_products_control(fpl_no, p_code, plan_id, plan_quantity) SELECT fpl.fpl_no, p.p_code, plan.plan_id, plan.plan_quantity FROM finished_products_lot fpl JOIN products p ON p.p_code = fpl.p_code JOIN production_plan plan ON plan.plan_id = fpl.plan_id ORDER BY plan.plan_id desc LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT fpc.fpc_bno, fpc.fpc_date, fpc.fpl_no, p.bom_id, p.p_name, fpc.fpc_expirydate, fpc.fpc_checkdate, fpc.fpc_quality_check, fpc.fpc_status, fpc.fpc_yield, plan.plan_quantity, fpc.fpc_quantity FROM finished_products_control fpc JOIN products p on p.p_code = fpc.p_code JOIN production_plan plan on plan.plan_id = fpc.plan_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO finished_products_lot (fpl_no, fpl_batch, w_code, p_code) SELECT CONCAT( sp.p_code, '-', sp.w_code, '-', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '-', LPAD(COALESCE(MAX(fpl.fpl_batch), 0) + 1, 3, '0') ) AS fpl_no, -- LOT 번호 생성 COALESCE(MAX(fpl.fpl_batch), 0) + 1 AS fpl_batch, sp.w_code, sp.p_code FROM stock_products sp LEFT JOIN finished_products_lot fpl ON sp.w_code = fpl.w_code AND sp.p_code = fpl.p_code GROUP BY sp.p_code, sp.w_code LIMIT 1
